name: Battery World
overview:
Since 1996 Battery World has been serving its customers with affordable, high-quality batteries, chargers, and accessories. That paired with our industry-leading customer service, make us the obvious choice for all your power solution needs. Whether you need a laptop battery, digital camera battery, camcorder battery, cordless phone battery, cell phone battery, or one of our thousands of other batteries, Batteryworld.com is the one-stop solution for you.

US-based global company with offices and warehouse facilities in Camarillo, CA, The Netherlands, and Hong Kong. In the past decade, Lenmar has won the coveted CES Design and Engineering Award six times.

Our mission: to provide accessible and renewable portable power solutions in a timely, environmentally friendly, and cost responsible manner to enrich evolving global lifestyles.

We will do this by: Listening to and being inspired by our customers Creating breakthroughs in the use of emerging technologies Building committed, genuine business relationships Standing behind our quality products Celebrating diversity
